snippet.title: Area of a Triangle - Fun challenging math problem
snippet.description:
Can you solve the area of a triangle given points X and Y. This is not a basic problem, but it is a fun and challenging math problem. See if you are smart enough to find the area of a triangle for yourself.

My name is Chris and my passion is to teach math. Learning should never be a struggle which is why I make all my videos as simple and fun as possible. I cover all subjects from basic level math through upper level calculus and statistics. I also make brain teaser, word problems, and Rubik's cube videos for fun. 

Check out some of my other videos if you want.

The Easiest brain teaser that will rack your brain
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nGNuAHnZRXU

Heaven and hell - Brain teaser
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOgKI0HWCnA

Two Burning Ropes - Word Problem
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IyGV5Ry9pQw

Cross the river - Brain Teaser
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTWfsUZSCXo

Game show - Word Problem
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ruX49qla1Ig

Don't checkmate - Brain Teaser
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fuEjP3XfaXA

Counterfeit coins - Word Problem
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6eF98_4lHU
